com.uploadcare.api

Class File

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uploadcare.api.File

  • public class File
extends Object
    The main Uploadcare resource, represents a user-uploaded file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CdnPathBuilder cdnPath()
      Creates a CDN path builder for this file.

      Deletes this file from Uploadcare.

        public URI getUrl()
        Returns the unique REST URL for this resource.
        Returns:
        REST URL

      • update

        public File update()
        Refreshes file data from Uploadcare. This does not mutate the current File instance, but creates a new one.
        Returns:
        New file resource instance

      • delete

        public File delete()
        Deletes this file from Uploadcare. This does not mutate the current File instance, but creates a new one.
        Returns:
        New file resource instance

      • save

        public File save()
        Saves this file on Uploadcare (marks it to be kept). This does not mutate the current File instance, but creates a new one.
        Returns:
        New file resource instance

      • cdnPath

        public CdnPathBuilder cdnPath()
        Creates a CDN path builder for this file.
        Returns:
        CDN path builder
        See Also:
        Urls.cdn(CdnPathBuilder)
